svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Number of people suffering from alcohol use disorders by region
Total number of people suffering from alcohol use disorders, by region. This is measured across all ages and both
sexes. Alcohol dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three or
more indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease
